title: U.S. Fed Chair Powell Says 'Nowhere Near' Pursuing CBDC, Won't Spy on Americans
description: Even if the Federal Reserve were close to recommending a central bank digital currency (CBDC) in the U.S., Chair Jerome Powell told lawmakers that the Fed has zero interest in a system in which it would have a view into user data.

title: Majority of social media posts about the metaverse show positive sentiment
description:
A review of 86,565 social media posts related to metaverse technology showed only 14% negative sentiment.

A team of researchers from the United Arab Emirates recently conducted a study to discover what people thought about the metaverse on social media.

The team curated a dataset of 86,565 posts on the X social media platform (formerly Twitter) and used machine learning to divide them into three categories representing sentiment: positive, neutral and negative.

According to the researchers, the distribution showed that posts expressing positive sentiments about the metaverse took up the lion’s share of the data with 45,506 (53% of the total). The researchers identified 28,663 posts displaying neutral sentiment, making up 33% of the total, and the final 14% (12,396 posts) showed negative sentiment.

Read more

title: Montenegro decides to extradite Do Kwon to South Korea in retrial
description:
The Montenegrin high court overseeing Terraform Labs co-founder Do Kwon’s extradition retrial has decided to send him back to South Korea instead of the US, local media reported on March 7. The decision will likely be final as the case has gone through multiple stages of trials and appeals over the past year as both […]
